培養土: (ばいようど) - potting soil; planting mix; compost

基: (ki/moto/motoi) - foundation , group; (free) radical; counter for installed or mounted objects (e.g. stone lanterns, gravestones, satellites)
基いて: (もとづいて) - based on; grounded on
基く: (もとづく) - to be grounded on; to be based on; to be due to; to originate from
基ずく: (もとずく) - to be grounded on; to be based on; to be due to; to originate from
基づく: (もとづく) - to be grounded on; to be based on; to be due to; to originate from
基付く: (もとづく) - to be grounded on; to be based on; to be due to; to originate from
基剤: (きざい) - base (e.g. of an ointment or suppository)
基層: (きそう) - base layer; substratum; binder course
基層文化: (きそうぶんか) - deep culture; fundamental culture (term created by German folkorist Hans Naumann)
